content: what is  DAVDroid etc: 'Send contacts to CardDAV'?

DAVDroid is an open-source synchronization app for Android devices that allows users to synchronize their contacts, calendars, and tasks with a remote server. It supports various protocols, including CardDAV, CalDAV, and WebDAV.

"Send contacts to CardDAV" refers to the capability of DAVDroid to send and sync contacts between your Android device and a CardDAV server. CardDAV is a protocol that enables the synchronization of address book data between different devices and services. With this feature, you can synchronize your contacts stored on your Android device with a CardDAV server, such as Nextcloud or ownCloud, ensuring that your contacts are up-to-date across multiple devices and platforms.
